example.eg: Natalie resolved the problem of her debts by taking a second job.
Harry resolved the mystery of food going missing in the night when he found Oliver sleepwalking to the fridge.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 解答, 解出, 找出…的答案

example.eg: Glenn resolved that he would lose weight.
The detective resolved to discover the identity of the killer, no matter what it took.
example.egtrans: 侦探决心，无论以什么代价，都要查明凶手的身份。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 决心做某事, 决意做某事

example.eg: Anna was determined to eat more healthily, but as she walked past the bakery, she could feel her resolve weakening.
example.egtrans: 安娜决心要更健康地饮食，但经过烘焙坊的时候，她觉得自己的决心动摇了。

example.eg: Emily awoke in the night and saw a monster at the end of her bed; as she became more fully awake, the monster resolved itself into her clothes thrown over the back of a chair.
This chord resolves in C major.
They are resolved to vote him out of office.
